# Kaimiečio Išleistuvės [![Unity 6000.3.3f1](https://img.shields.io/badge/unity-6000.3.3f1%2B-blue.svg)](unityhub://6000.3.3f1/ef04196de0d6)

## About

This game will be developed during [Global Game Jam 2026](https://globalgamejam.org/games/2026/kaimiecio-isleistuves-4) in 48 hours, where the theme was "Mask".

### LT

Žėk, šiandien mokyklos laidos išleistuvės, bet tavęs niekas nekvietė, nes nu - tu lopas. Iškalba nepasižymi, plius - dar ir iš kito kaimo. Pasislėpęs po akiniais ir geriausiais tėvo rūbais neišsiduok, gal pritapsi ir išgert gausi. O jei ne - makufelį daužys tau gezai. Nusimato įdomus vakaras!

### EN

Tonight is the school prom, but nobody invited you because, well - you’re a loser. You’re not exactly known for your social skills, and on top of that, you’re from another village. Hide behind your glasses and your dad’s best clothes and try not to stand out - maybe you’ll blend in and even get a drink. And if not, some local thugs might smash your face. Looks like an interesting night ahead!

## Development

- Unity [Unity 6000.3.3f1](unityhub://6000.3.3f1/ef04196de0d6)
- [GitHub Desktop](https://desktop.github.com/download/) or [Git Bash](https://git-scm.com/downloads)
- [Rider](https://www.jetbrains.com/rider) or [Visual Studio](https://visualstudio.microsoft.com)
- [FMOD Studio 2.03](https://www.fmod.com/download) (optional)
